about_the_game:
This soundtrack is also available in a bundle together with the original game for free!

Immerse yourself in the official soundtrack to Unterholz. Take an aural stroll through the dark forests of the mossclad copse and follow the lone knight on his perilous journey.

Enjoy the music of Unterholz in the highest possible fidelity outside of the game, via the integrated Steam Soundtrack app and wherever you like.

All tracks are available in MP3 format as well as FLAC lossless quality.

Artwork by James Hutton

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 47 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 227 MB available space

short_description: This is the complete official soundtrack for Unterholz (available for free in a bundle with the game).
